item.title: Beginnings of a Guitar Journey
item.author: ivan@iky.li (Ivan Li)
item.description: I’m super excited to start on this journey to learn to play the guitar. This will be the first music instrument since the end of high school - almost 13 years ago. This won’t be the first time I’ve picked up the guitar. I started learning it when I was at intermediate school. Though the memories are vague and I would probably need to start all over again. Why Guitar? In recent years, my cup of tea when it comes to music has gravitated towards acoustic guitar music - especially unplugged versions of pop songs.
